attributes.action: Demand USA to stop the ‘family separation’ policy & stop traumatising children
attributes.additional_details:
Chalabi M 2018 How many migrant children are detained in US custody? 
Dreby 2015 US immigration policy and family separationSocial Science & Medicine
Hagan 2018 US Deportation Policy Family Separation, and Circular Migration: International Migration Review.
Pompa 2019. Children Continue to Die in Government Custody, and DHS is Dodging Accountability  ACLU
RAICES 2019 Children Should Not Be “Apprehended” At The Border. 
Slack Martínez 2018. In Harm’s Way Family Separation, Immigration
attributes.background: Six children have died in US custody as their health was neglected after a horrific ordeal pursuing the American dream. 15,000 children detained in these centres. Travelling with a family their only comfort in life to hold the warm hand of someone they loved.  No toys no food just love. No longer.
